content.description:
Stand Start at obvious undercling on the left side of the tall northface of the boulder. Pull on and make a hard move to a large pocket. From here position your feet in order to use more undercling to the right.

Top out On the grainy slab.
content.location: Left most route on the north face of the boulder.

content.description: Start sitting, matched on the sloper in the center of the face, and make a crux move up into the seam as for Slashface of the Buttermilks. Follow the seam to top out.
content.location: The Northern side of the Painted Cave Boulder on the flat face.

content.description: Start standing at a head high jug on the right side of the face. Move up and left into the seam, and top out as for Slashface of the Buttermilks.
content.location: The Northern face of the Painted Cave Boulder.

content.description:
This problem starts a few feet left of the center of the tall face with the diagnol cracks. Sit or squat start an awkward holds. Make a hard pull up to gain the thin seams and continue up and right following the crack system until you can reach good edges.

The top out is a bit desperate with a crimp and a small xenolith knob feature.

The sit start goes at v8 and a right start is also possible about 4 feet right of the sit. The right start is a v7, and uses a sweet slopey pinch blob and joins the v6 with a small crimp.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter.
content.location: This problem is to the right of a large tree growing close to the boulder. A few feet down and right of the undercling features in a crack system.

content.description:
One of the most unique climbs in the area, this climb utilizes a variety of different sized huecos on the outside of a large cave-like roof found on the south western side of the boulder. This is a powerful sloper testpiece, so bring some skin and some psych for this burly classic!

Sit start at the rightside of The large cave on a flat shelf in a hueco. Make a few hard moves left to the edge of the roof and set up for a reach to a hueco outside the cave. From here swing over and match the slopey hueco. Once matched, figure out how to reach up the the sun-baked slopers before a committing last move to a good hold!
content.location: On the South facing side of the boulder.
